name: sysstat Chef cookbook
readme:
Description
===========

Installs/Configures sysstat

Requirements
============

* Chef 0.8+

Attributes
==========

* default['sysstat']['settings'] - Path to default settings file.
* default['sysstat']['enabled'] - Run sysstat on boot.

Usage
=====

    "run_list": [
      "recipe[sysstat]"
    ]

default
----

Installs/Configures sysstat

TODO
====
